name: Ghost Pushers
description:
Ghost Pushers is a roguelike for those who love ghost hunting.

Protect yourself by repelling ghosts with your lantern and attract lots of them with your spectral vacuum cleaner to collect its Ectoplasmic Energy!

By collecting Ectoplasmic Energy you'll unlock exclusive upgrades and become stronger to face all sorts of spooky creatures.

As you advance between Rounds, stronger enemies will try to hunt you down - so you must hunt them first!

Enjoy this ghost bustering adventure and clean it all!
